description:
`Expandable` handles the show/hide functionality for both [`ToggleDetails`](#ToggleDetails)
and [`ToggleGroup`](#ToggleGroup).

expanded.description: Whether the content is expanded or hidden. Makes the component controlled, so if provided, the `onToggle` handler has to be provided too.

defaultExpanded.description: Whether the content is initially expanded or hidden (uncontrolled)

type.name: signature

value.name: signature
value.raw: >( props?: P & { onClick?: React.MouseEventHandler } ) => { 'aria-controls': string 'aria-expanded': boolean onClick: (event: React.MouseEvent) => void } & P

return.name: intersection

properties.description: Props to be spread onto the trigger element
Props to be spread onto the details element

type.name: signature

value.name: signature
value.raw: >( props?: P & { onClick?: React.MouseEventHandler } ) => { 'aria-controls': string 'aria-expanded': boolean onClick: (event: React.MouseEvent) => void } & P

return.name: intersection

properties.description: Props to be spread onto the trigger element
Props to be spread onto the details element

title: Expandable
